Plot: A New Jersey guy dedicated to his family, friends, and church, develops unrealistic expectations from watching porn and works to find happiness and intimacy with his potential true love.
Title: Don Jon
Actors: Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Scarlett Johansson, Julianne Moore, Tony Danza
tomatoConsensus: Don Jon proves to be an amiable directing debut for Joseph Gordon-Levitt, and a vivacious showcase for his co-star, Scarlett Johansson.
